html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12082024-11-08ECCC, TB
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
Financial Administration Act
SubjectMemorandum of Undersdanting with provinces and territories Respecting the National Air Pollution Surveillance Program
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of the Environment to sign a Memorandum of Understanding with the Provinces and Territories respecting the NATIONAL AIR POLLUTION SURVEILLANCE PROGRAM in order to (1) lease ambient (outdoor) air quality monitoring equipment to the governments of the provinces and territories; and (2) to continue leasing air quality monitoring equipment to the provinces and territories under subsection 61(2) of the FINANCIAL ADMINSTRATION ACT.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of the Environment to sign a Memorandum of Understanding with the Provinces and Territories respecting the NATIONAL AIR POLLUTION SURVEILLANCE PROGRAM in order to (1) lease ambient (outdoor) air quality monitoring equipment to the governments of the provinces and territories; and (2) to continue leasing air quality monitoring equipment to the provinces and territories under subsection 61(2) of the FINANCIAL ADMINSTRATION ACT.
